name: id
description: Primary key: Unique identifier for the tax record.

name: payroll_record_id
description: Foreign key: ID of the associated payroll record.

name: tax_type
description: Type of tax (e.g., 'Federal Income Tax', 'Social Security').

name: jurisdiction
description: Jurisdiction where the tax is applied (e.g., 'CA', 'IL', or 'Federal').

name: created_at
description: Timestamp when the tax record was created.

name: updated_at
description: Timestamp when the tax record was last updated.
